vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σαδώκ, ὁ indecl. (Heb. צָדוֹק, see supr., see word Σαδδουκαῖος)
Sadoc, Zadok: Mat.1:14.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, first mentioned at Mat.1.14;
son of: Azor (G0107);
father of: Achim (G0885)
§ Zadok, "righteous one"
Zadok, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 1:14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒督 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來原文的意思是 "公正的"
在基督的家譜裡面，是所羅巴伯的後裔 #太 1:14|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒督 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来原文的意思是 "公正的"
在基督的家谱里面，是所罗巴伯的后裔 #太 1:14|
